lump.translate: кусок, глыба, ком, опухоль, кусковой, взятый в целом, сваливать
examples: I've got a lump on my shoulder.
One lump or two?
They used to buy ten kilos of beef in one lump.
Strain the custard to remove lumps.
He had taken a lot of lumps growing up in the city.
turning a lump of clay into a beautiful pot
When you retire you'll get a lump sum of £80,000.
He's a big fat lump.
He lumped down again and stared before him stupidly.
Howard had to have cancer surgery for a lump in his chest.
There was a lump in her throat as she gazed at the child.
Melt a lump of butter in your frying-pan.
Whether we like him or lump him, he is master of the situation.
The lump was surgically removed.
Finding a lump does not necessarily mean you have cancer.
He got a lump on his head after bumping into the doorway.
You should never ignore a breast lump.
He commuted his pension for a lump sum.
I earned sixteen shillings a week by lumping in the docks.
They've been told: take the lower interest rate, or lump it.
He found a suspicious lump on his back and was afraid it might be cancer.
He commuted his pension into a lump sum.
You can't lump the symptoms together and blame them all on stress.

Он снова тяжело сел и тупо уставился перед собой.

Растопите на сковороде кусочек сливочного масла.

Им сказали: нравится или нет — берите более низкую процентную ставку, и всё тут.
